quote: To love is nothing. To be loved is something. But to love and be loved, that’s everything.
author: T. Tolis

quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
author: Lao-Tzu

quote: Love is like war: easy to begin but very hard to stop.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: Thinking of you keeps me awake. Dreaming of you keeps me asleep. Being with you keeps me alive.
author: Unknown

quote: Love is so short, forgetting is so long.
author: Pablo Neruda

quote: Love is a fire. But whether it is going to warm your hearth or burn down your house, you can never tell.
author: Joan Crawford

quote: Women are meant to be loved, not to be understood.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: If you love somebody, let them go, for if they return, they were always yours. And if they don’t, they never were.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr

quote: There is no love without forgiveness, and there is no forgiveness without love.
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: The best and most beautiful things in this world cannot be seen or even heard, but must be felt with the heart.
author: Helen Keller

quote: You know it's love when all you want is that person to be happy, even if you're not part of their happiness.
author: Julia Roberts

quote: Where there is love there is life.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: We waste time looking for the perfect lover instead of creating the perfect love.
author: Tom Robbins

quote: If you love two people at the same time, choose the second. Because if you really loved the first one, you wouldn’t have fallen for the second.
author: Johnny Depp

quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: When someone loves you, the way they talk about you is different. You feel safe and comfortable.
author: Jess C. Scott

quote:
Tis better to have loved and lost
Than never to have loved at all.
author: Alfred Tennyson

quote: One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote:
And, in the end
The love you take
is equal to the love you make.
author: Paul McCartney

quote: When the power of love overcomes the love of power, the world will know peace.
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love.
author: Albert Einstein

quote:
How do you spell 'love'? - Piglet
You don't spell it...you feel it. - Pooh”
author: A.A. Milne

quote: I don’t care how hard being together is, nothing is worse than being apart.
author: Starcrossed

quote: You know how they say you only hurt the ones you love? Well, it works both ways.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: Don't cry over someone who wouldn't cry over you.
author: Lauren Conrad

quote: When you trip over love, it is easy to get up. But when you fall in love, it is impossible to stand again.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Few are those who see with their own eyes and feel with their own hearts.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Put your hand on a hot stove for a minute and it seems like an hour. Sit with a pretty girl for an hour, and it seems like a minute.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Love is a better teacher than duty.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The most important thing in the world is family and love.
author: John Wooden

quote: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
author: Rumi

quote: A flower cannot blossom without sunshine, and man cannot live without love.
author: Max Muller

quote: The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.
author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quote: True love stories never have endings.
author: Richard Bach

quote: Never make a decision when you are upset, sad, jealous or in love.
author: Mario Teguh

quote: May you live as long as you wish and love as long as you live.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: Love comes unseen; we only see it go.
author: Henry Austin Dobson

quote: Men always want to be a woman's first love - women like to be a man's last romance.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: No matter how dark the moment, love and hope are always possible.
author: George Chakiris

quote: Immature love says: 'I love you because I need you.' Mature love says 'I need you because I love you.'
author: Erich Fromm

quote: Love does not dominate; it cultivates.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: To be able to say how much love, is love but little.
author: Petrarch

quote: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Life is a game and true love is a trophy.
author: Rufus Wainwright

quote: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: The first duty of love is to listen.
author: Paul Tillich

quote: Everyday life is like programming, I guess. If you love something you can put beauty into it.
author: Donald Knuth

quote: The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: Love cures people - both the ones who give it and the ones who receive it.
author: Karl A. Menninger

quote: It is sad not to love, but it is much sadder not to be able to love.
author: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: Love is the greatest gift that God has given us. It's free.
author: Taraji P. Henson

quote: There is no person that love cannot heal; there is no soul that love cannot save.
author: Carlos Santana

quote: Friendship often ends in love; but love in friendship - never.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
author: Loretta Young

quote: Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold.
author: Zelda Fitzgerald

quote: Love is a game that two can play and both win.
author: Eva Gabor

quote: To love is to act.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Because of a great love, one is courageous.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: When a woman is talking to you, listen to what she says with her eyes.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Patience is the mark of true love. If you truly love someone, you will be more patient with that person.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Age does not protect you from love, but love to some extent protects you from age.
author: Jeanne Moreau

quote: It doesn’t matter if the guy is perfect or the girl is perfect, as long as they are perfect for each other.
author: Sean

quote: The supreme happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: True love is born from understanding.
author: Buddha

quote: A good head and a good heart are always a formidable combination.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: You wanna know who I’m in love with? Read the first word again.
author: Unknown

quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy to a friend.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Love is the weakest when there is more doubt than trust, but love is the strongest when we learn to trust in spite of the doubts.
author: Unknown

quote: Love is when you give someone the power to destroy you but trusting him not to.
author: Unknown

quote: And if you ever feel lonely, look at the moon, somewhere, some one else is looking at it too.
author: Unknown

quote: The Sun loved the Moon so much he died every night just to let her breathe.
author: Unknown

quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
author: Euripides

quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: The heart wants what it wants. There's no logic to these things. You meet someone and you fall in love and that's that.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Pleasure of love lasts but a moment. Pain of love lasts a lifetime.
author: Bette Davis

quote: All you need is love. Love is all you need.
author: John Lennon

quote: Where there is great love, there are always miracles
author: Willa Cather

quote: The love we give away is the only love we keep.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: The most desired gift of love is not diamonds or roses or chocolate. It is focused attention.
author: Richard Warren

quote: It is better to love wisely, no doubt: but to love foolishly is better than not to be able to love at all.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: Love is the hardest habit to break and the most difficult to satisfy.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: Love always brings difficulties, that is true, but the good side of it is that it gives energy.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Love without reason lasts the longest.
author: Unknown

quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us.
author: Helen Keller

quote: The one thing we can never get enough of is love. And the one thing we never give enough is love.
author: Henry Miller

quote: The best things in life can never be kept; they must be given away. A Smile, a Kiss, and Love.
author: Tony Farrar

quote: You don’t marry someone you can live with – you marry the person whom you cannot live without.
author: Unknown

quote: Lucky is the man who is the first love of a woman, but luckier is the woman who is the last love of a man.
author: Unknown

quote: The spaces between our fingers were created so that another person’s fingers could fill them in.
author: Unknown

quote: There are many things in life that will catch your eye, but only a few will catch your heart … pursue those.
author: Unknown

quote: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr

quote: To live is like to love - all reason is against it, and all healthy instinct for it.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: Love asks me no questions, And gives me endless support.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: You can give without loving, But you cannot love without giving.
author: Amy Carmicheal

quote: To live is like to love - all reason is against it, and all healthy instinct for it.
author: Samuel Butler
